description: {"blocks":[{"key":"gb6m","text":"CoBG-11 is a coculture medium used to coculture cyanobacteria and E. coli by Zhang et al (2020). It is optimized for E. coli growth. Here are its components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1nlq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajqqq","text":"1. 150 mM NaCl,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ofk6","text":"2. 4 mM NH4Cl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hsdk","text":"3. 3 g/L 2-[[1,3-dihydroxy-2-(hydroxymethyl) propan-2-yl] amino] ethanesulfonic acid (TES)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h19g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16lg7","text":"The pH value is adjusted with NaOH to 8.3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43i3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biu7m","text":"The protocol below describes the preparation of 100ml of coBG-11. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Cyanobacteria, E. coli, coculture, growth media

references.title: Construction and analysis of an artificial consortium based on the fast-growing cyanobacterium Synechococcus elongatus UTEX 2973 to produce the platform chemical 3-hydroxypropionic acid from CO2.
references.authors: Zhang L, Chen L, Diao J, Song X, Shi M, Zhang W

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"45v7r","text":"Measure   ,  , and   and add it to a 150mL flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ee6cb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"764ln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c3q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fnnv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.88","error":false,"guid":"BED49BD0300F11EC9786F5CDC98D33D0","id":0,"label":"NaCl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.0214","error":false,"guid":"CC655B40300F11EC9786F5CDC98D33D0","id":0,"label":"NH4Cl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.3","error":false,"guid":"ECE201C0300F11EC9786F5CDC98D33D0","id":0,"label":"TES buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"71ibe","text":"These calculations have been made for 100 mL coBG-11. {"blocks":[{"key":"2ol0d","text":"Add   to the flask and mix till contents dissolve. If salt persists, add 10mL more of BG-11 and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6mfcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"36966A40301011EC9786F5CDC98D33D0","id":0,"label":"BG-11","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8bm0l","text":"Once contents dissolve, add BG-11 up to 95 mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bcpk6","text":"Adjust pH of the solution to 8.3 with NaOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n7an","text":"Fill BG-11 up to 100 mL measure pH and adjust if required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jca0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"pbsc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"95geg","text":"Autoclave CoBG-11 before using.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
